Text:
I have converted HD captured file into wmv lower resolution format (856 x 480). I used Cyberlink Mediaespresso. I think quality is quite watchable. But maybe if someone could recommend me a better format using HD source I would be very grateful . Thanks.

If you want the original HD quality check out this one: (have in mind tough that as my upload sucks it could took you quite a long time downloading it cause HD files are huge)
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7140197/Milan_Vs_Barcelona._Quarter_Final_Champions_league_First_leg

Just a friendly tip mate , TPB search engine is one of the worst , because you have put this filel all into one word ( Milanvsbarcelonastandardqualtity ) no one will ever be able to find it . but if you had split it like  ( Milan vs barcelona standard qualtity ) people would have found it by just searching for milan or barcelona .

@Shepard76

You will get best results (quality/size of file) if u encode ur HD captured file using the x264 (MPEG-4 AVC / H.264 ) encoding - 

http://www.videolan.org/developers/x264.html

MPEG-4 AVC / H.264 - 

http://forum.doom9.org/showthread.php?t=96059
